name: Multiverse Traveler Training Academy
description:
Multiverse Traveler Training Academy is a fast paced shooter.
Theme : " It's not supposed to do that "
- Speed boost gives jump boost.
- Jump boost gives speed boost.
- Water doesnt drown player, bounces them back up.
- Guns dont shoot but create shield.
- Grenades dont explode but are used to teleport.

Controls
-WASD to move
-Spacebar to jump
-Left Mouse Button to attack
-Right mouse button for additional support
-Middlemouse button to scroll between weapons
-E to interact
- Escape / Backspace to Pause/Quit

Thanks for taking the time to play my game.
